DOC.detailed_description: This multicentre , open-label trial paediatric subject ( age 4 12 year ) FFR administer prucalopride oral solution daily 8 week . Subjects enter extension trial complete PRU-USA-12 , single-dose pharmacokinetic trial , usually within previous week . Evaluations efficacy , safety tolerability perform , plasma sample analysis prucalopride level obtain 2 , 4 , 6 8 week . The initial dosage prucalopride oral solution 0.02 mg/kg/day . Dependent subject 's response , parent could adjust dosage within range 0.01 mg/kg/day 0.03 mg/kg/day .
